HTTP Routing Table

/v1
 
/v1
GET /v1/events/(username)
GET /v1/events?page=X&per_page=Y
GET /v1/keys
GET /v1/keys/(name)
GET /v1/privs
GET /v1/privs/(privilege)
GET /v1/user/(username)/login
GET /v1/user/(username)?can=(privilege)
POST /v1/keys
POST /v1/roles/
POST /v1/roles/(name)
PUT /v1/keys
PUT /v1/roles
PUT /v1/user
DELETE /v1/keys
DELETE /v1/privs
DELETE /v1/roles
DELETE /v1/users/(username)
